Original:
奉勸大家！
去這酒吧 沒事的話最好不要拿出手機拍照：）
因為在DJ台上方的燈是使用功率很強的雷射光！！我和朋友的手機鏡頭都遭殃 出現「紫斑」🥲 之前去其他酒吧/夜店也有舞台燈效，就算拍照也沒造成這樣的鏡頭損壞，沒想到第一次去bar24就這樣不愉快

最後給店家建議：
1. 更換雷射燈 / 降低其功率
2. 若無法做到第一點的話，可以在客人入場前給特意提醒：舞台雷射燈有致手機鏡頭損壞的風險
EN:
Advise everyone!
If you go to this bar is okay, it is best not to take out your mobile phone to take a picture :)
Because the light above DJ is a laser light with strong power!IntersectionMy friend and my mobile phone lens suffered "purple spots". Before going to other bars/nightclubs, there were stage lighting effects. Even if you took pictures, it did not cause such a lens damage.

Finally give the store suggestion:
1. Replace the laser light / reduce its power
2. If the first point cannot be achieved, you can remind the guests before entering the venue: the risk of the stage laser light can cause the mobile phone lens damage

Original:
安管很刁難人！
11/3 00:00左右
我左手已經有un手環 兩張證件的給他了 銀行卡兩張簽名也是我的名字

要不是朋友的演出

EN:

11/3 00:00

If it weren't for a friend's performance

Original:
之前為了看一場表演特地前往，現場本身雷射光極強，然後現場也完全沒提醒拍攝會損害鏡頭，拍攝完後導致當天手機直接感光元件被雷射光照壞？後來拍攝畫面都會一直出現大片紅點（真的不誇張，手機拍照畫面如圖），拿手機去維修，維修費非常貴⋯為了開心十分鐘，花掉了一大筆維修費真的不值，心情也很糟糕🙄
去了一二十次其他家夜店酒吧，一樣會拿出手機拍攝表演，但也沒發生鏡頭壞掉問題，不知道店家當初在設計舞台，有沒有想過雷射光太誇張這個問題，把客人手機鏡頭照射壞掉又該怎麼辦，總之以後沒事大概不會想再來這家店了，整個大負評🙃
EN:
In order to watch a performance, the laser light was very strong, and then the scene did not remind the shooting to damage the camera. After the shooting, the mobile phone directly sensitive component was taken illuminated by the laser?Later, a large red dot will appear in the shooting screen (really no exaggeration, the picture of the mobile phone is shown in the figure). Take the mobile phone to repair it. The maintenance fee is very expensive. For ten minutes, it is not worth it. The mood is also bad
After going to other nightclub bars in other home nightclubs, I will also take out my mobile phone to shoot, but there is no problem with the shot. I do n’t know if the store was designing the stage at the beginning. Have you ever thought that the laser light is too exaggerated? What should I do if the lens is broken?
